One Hub for
Every Business

Why struggle with multiple platforms when you can manage it all in one place?

With 6amMart eCommerce software, you can manage grocery, food, pharmacy, fashion, and more businesses from a single, easy-to-use dashboard from the admin panel.

So what’s in it for you?

  • Run multiple businesses with zero hassle or platform-switching
  • ​Keep operations efficient with one easy-to-use dashboard
  • Focus on growing your business, not managing systems
Contact Now

Run a Seamless
Multi-Zone Business

You don’t have to be tied to one location to grow your business. You can serve multiple zones with the best ecommerce solution without stepping away from your desk.

Sounds like a dream? MarketKing makes it real.

With this feature, you can: 

  • ​Expand your business to new zones with zero hassle
  • Centralize and control operations easily
  • Onboard vendors by zone to simplify management
Contact Now

Manage Hundreds of
Vendors

Handling multiple vendors used to be overwhelming, but not with MarketKing. You can onboard and manage as many vendors as you like. Vendors get their app and panel, with a built-in POS, to run their stores independently.

It’s simple, efficient, and designed to make it easy for you and the vendor to grow. 

  • Simplify vendor management with easy-to-use tools
  • Let vendors easily operate and sell products using a built-in POS
  • Scale your business while keeping everything under control
Contact Now

Accept Payments
Anywhere, Anytime

Payment issues are one of the biggest headaches for eCommerce platforms. 6amMart removes that burden. 

It easily integrates with top payment gateways for quick, secure payments without any complications. 

How it enhances customer experience: 

  • ​Provide customers with diverse payment methods
  • ​Integrate with leading payment gateways in a few clicks
  • Accept cash on delivery, digital & offline payments on your multi vendor ecommerce website
Contact Now

Make Smart Decisions
Instantly

Stop second-guessing and start making decisions based on data. With real data, MarketKing multi vendor marketplace software lets you turn insights into actionable steps.

It transforms how you make decisions by providing actionable insights right when you need them. 

With MarketKing, you can:

  • ​Monitor your business performance with real-time analytics
  • ​Identify trends and growth opportunities for your eCommerce website
  • Make decisions backed by data, not guesswork
Contact Now

Run Campaigns That
Drive Results

Ready to run campaigns that actually deliver results?

MarketKing multivendor ecommerce website provides powerful promotion management tools like campaigns, banners, coupons, discounts, cashback, and advertisements.

The best part? You won’t have to purchase any third-party promotion management tools.

You can – 

  • ​Easily create and manage campaigns 
  • ​Retain loyal customers through special offers
  • ​Run targeted promotions that accelerate sales
Contact Now

No More Messy
Product Catalogs

MarketKing simplifies product setup and organization. It optimizes inventory management by easily organizing, categorizing, and setting up every item.

No more wasting time looking for products or fixing mistakes as it maintains accurate inventory.

With this feature, you can – 

  • Categorize and assign attributes to products
  • ​Set up new products in your ecommerce multi vendor website with unit definitions
  • Maintain an organized & scalable product list with a structured catalog
Contact Now

Never Miss a
Sale Again

Missed orders used to be the norm, frustrating customers and losing revenue. MarketKing’s reliable order confirmation models ensure every sale is captured.

You won’t miss a single sale with our confirmation models—where either the store confirms, prepares, and hands off the order to the deliveryman, or the deliveryman confirms and coordinates with the store. This ecommerce website software is designed to make your order flow effortless.

This is what you can do – 

  • Choose who can confirm orders for effective delivery management
  • ​Ensure prompt handling and delivery without delays
  • ​Keep your sales pipeline active and efficient at all times
Contact Now

Manage Online & Offline
Sales Together

MarketKing’s built-in POS lets your vendors expand their sales beyond the digital realm. With one platform, they can manage online and offline sales without hassle, maximizing reach and revenue opportunities. This software for ecommerce business is great for keeping everything in one place.

This is what your vendors can do – 

  • Process both online and offline transactions seamlessly
  • Maintain real-time inventory across all sales channels
  • Make data-driven decisions with unified analytics
Contact Now

Apps That Reach
Everyone

Building separate apps for different platforms can drain your budget. MarketKing apps are developed using Flutter, ensuring compatibility with both iOS and Android devices.

This is what you can do:

  • ​Easily onboard vendors and customers, no matter their device
  • Expand your business reach across both major platforms
  • ​Offer seamless app performance without doubling your costs
Contact Now

Unlock the Power of
Vehicle Rentals

Why hold back when you can offer vehicle rentals to your customers?

With the MarketKing Rental Module, you can integrate a complete vehicle rental service into your existing multi-vendor platform with just one click. It helps reduce ecommerce development time and effort by adding ready-to-use rental features.

So what you’re getting with this module– 

  • Empower providers with self-registration for faster onboarding 
  • Smart search & filters to help customers find the perfect vehicle 
  • Maximize revenue with flexible pricing (hourly or distance-based)
Contact Now

    How To Start

    Turning Your Vision
    Into Reality in 4 Steps

    Step 1

    Discuss

    Book a meeting with our experts to share your vision and challenges.  We’ll listen, guide, and brainstorm the best strategy for eCommerce platform tailored to your goals.

    Step 2

    Define

    We’ll help you clarify your business needs, making sure they are perfectly synchronized with your planned objectives and strategies.

    Step 3

    Deploy

    Our team will build and configure MarketKing, deploy it to your server, and ensure everything runs smoothly before making it live.

    Step 4

    Delight

    We’ll make your business live and ready to serve. Then, it’s time to scale, grow, and delight customers with a multi-vendor marketplace experience powered by MarketKing.

    FAQ

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Below are some frequently asked questions regarding MarketKing.

    Can I start with a small area and expand later? I want to test in my neighborhood first.

    Absolutely! Start as small as a single neighborhood. Our platform lets you add new zones in just a few clicks. Many successful partners started with 2-3 zones and expanded as they grew. You can add new areas anytime without any technical help. MarketKing’s flexible module-creating option and centralized control make it easy to scale, add new vendors, or expand into new business zones without switching platforms. It’s a smarter alternative to custom ecommerce software development when you want to grow fast without the usual build-from-scratch delays.

    Are there any built-in marketing tools to promote my business?

    Yes! MarketKing includes features like promotional banners, coupons, campaigns, and push notifications to help you run effective marketing strategies and drive sales.

    What kind of businesses can I run with MarketKing?

    MarketKing, the best ecommerce software, supports a wide range of business modules, including grocery, food delivery, pharmacy, parcel delivery, fashion, accessories, rental, and more. You can even add custom modules to suit your needs.

    What payment and delivery options are available?

    MarketKing integrates with popular payment gateways and supports flexible delivery options, including payment methods like cash on delivery, digital payment, and offline payment. 

    What key eCommerce solution features does MarketKing offer?

    MarketKing provides essential eCommerce solution features, including multi-zone management, built-in Point of Sale (POS), vendor management, customer management, promotion management, real-time order tracking, a powerful admin panel, and easy vendor onboarding.

    How secure is the MarketKing platform for handling transactions?

    MarketKing is built with security in mind, offering secure payment integrations and data protection for smooth and safe transactions. Like all reliable ecommerce solutions, it prioritizes user trust and compliance-ready features.

    Why is MarketKing the best eCommerce marketplace platform for new businesses?

    MarketKing simplifies business setup with ready-to-use features, an intuitive admin panel, and multi-module capabilities, making it the best eCommerce marketplace platform for startups and growing businesses.
